information:
Chris Stapleton received six nominations for the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards. His nominations are for Male Artist of the Year, Entertainer of the Year, Album of the Year, Single of the Year, Music Event of the Year (with Carly Pearce), and Visual Media of the Year. Other top nominees include Ella Langley with eight nominations, and Cody Johnson and Morgan Wallen, who are tied with seven nominations each. Lainey Wilson also received six nominations.

Chris Stapleton has a history of success at industry awards. He has won 19 ACM Awards and 19 CMA Awards throughout his career. In November 2024, at the CMA Awards, he won four awards, including single and song of the year for 'White Horse' and was named male vocalist of the year for a record-extending eighth time. In February 2025, he won his 11th career Grammy Award for Best Country Solo Performance for the song 'It Takes A Woman'.

The 60th Academy of Country Music Awards are scheduled to take place on May 8, 2025, streaming live from the Ford Center at The Star in Frisco, Texas. Reba McEntire will host the event for the 18th time. The lineup of performers announced for the ceremony includes Chris Stapleton and Dua Lipa.

forecast.status_quo_outcome: Chris Stapleton is a dominant figure at country music awards, with a long history of winning. He recently won multiple CMA awards and a Grammy for the same body of work he is nominated for at the ACMs. The status quo is that he will win at least one award.
forecast.no_outcome_scenario: Despite receiving six nominations, Stapleton is shut out in every category. Voters may opt to spread the awards among other popular and highly-nominated artists like Morgan Wallen, Cody Johnson, and Lainey Wilson, or reward a breakout artist like Ella Langley, leading to Stapleton losing in each of his nominated categories.
forecast.yes_outcome_scenario: Leveraging his critical acclaim and recent wins at the CMA Awards and Grammys, Chris Stapleton's momentum carries through to the ACMs. He converts at least one of his six nominations into a win, most likely in categories like Male Artist of the Year or Single of the Year.
forecast.rationale: My forecast is based primarily on Chris Stapleton's consistent and proven track record at major country music awards, combined with the high number of nominations he received this year. With 19 prior ACM awards and recent significant wins at the 2024 CMA Awards and 2025 Grammy Awards for the same work, the status quo strongly suggests he is a favorite among voters. Having six nominations provides multiple, independent opportunities for a win; while he faces stiff competition in each category, the probability of him losing all six is low. The main reason the forecast is not higher is the strength of the other top nominees, such as Morgan Wallen, Cody Johnson, Lainey Wilson, and Ella Langley. There is always a possibility that voters will choose to recognize other artists, leading to an unexpected shutout. The forecast is not lower because a complete shutout of an artist of Stapleton's stature, with this many nominations and recent accolades, would be a major statistical anomaly and a significant upset. I would raise my probability if influential industry publications begin predicting a Stapleton win in a major category. Conversely, I would lower my probability if a strong narrative or wave of support consolidates around a single competitor across multiple categories in the days leading up to the ceremony.

prompt:
You are a professional forecaster interviewing for a job.

Your interview question is:
Will Chris Stapleton win an award at the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards?

Question background:
The awards are scheduled to be held on May 8, 2025. Stapleton has 5 nominations.


This question's outcome will be determined by the specific criteria below. These criteria have not yet been satisfied:
This question resolves as **Yes** if Chris Stapleton wins an award at the [60th Academy of Country Music Awards](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/60th_Academy_of_Country_Music_Awards).




Your research assistant's report says:
Chris Stapleton received six nominations for the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards. His nominations are for Male Artist of the Year, Entertainer of the Year, Album of the Year, Single of the Year, Music Event of the Year (with Carly Pearce), and Visual Media of the Year. Other top nominees include Ella Langley with eight nominations, and Cody Johnson and Morgan Wallen, who are tied with seven nominations each. Lainey Wilson also received six nominations.

Chris Stapleton has a history of success at industry awards. He has won 19 ACM Awards and 19 CMA Awards throughout his career. In November 2024, at the CMA Awards, he won four awards, including single and song of the year for 'White Horse' and was named male vocalist of the year for a record-extending eighth time. In February 2025, he won his 11th career Grammy Award for Best Country Solo Performance for the song 'It Takes A Woman'.

The 60th Academy of Country Music Awards are scheduled to take place on May 8, 2025, streaming live from the Ford Center at The Star in Frisco, Texas. Reba McEntire will host the event for the 18th time. The lineup of performers announced for the ceremony includes Chris Stapleton and Dua Lipa.

Today is 2025-04-22.

Before answering you think:
(a) The time left until the outcome to the question is known.
(b) The status quo outcome if nothing changed.
(c) A brief description of a scenario that results in a No outcome.
(d) A brief description of a scenario that results in a Yes outcome.
(e) You write your rationale remembering that good forecasters put extra weight on the status quo outcome since the world changes slowly most of the time. Explain your reasoning and the evidence behind your forecast in detail. Summarise information your received from your research assistant that influences your forecast (if any). Explain why your forecast is not higher, and why it is not lower. Outline what would need to be true for you to update your forecast in either direction.
(f) The last thing you write is your final probabilistic forecast as a number between 0 and 100.

# OUTPUT SCHEMA
{
    "time_left_until_outcome_known": "string",
    "status_quo_outcome": "string",
    "no_outcome_scenario": "string",
    "yes_outcome_scenario": "string",
    "rationale": "string",
    "probability": "number" (0-100)
}
